mapper.select: select a.id as event_id , c.name as event_title , c.description as event_description , a.image_id as event_image_id , a.start_date as event_start_date , a.end_date as event_end_date , b.adjusted_price as max_discounted_price , b.discounted_price as min_discounted_price from event a left join event_products b on (b.event_id = a.id) left join product c on (c.id = b.product_id) where a.status = 'ACTIVE' and a.start_date <= CURDATE() and a.end_date >= CURDATE() and a.post_id is null and b.is_main_visible = true and c.status = 'ACTIVE' order by a.start_date, a.created_at, b.display_order, c.name

select a.event_id , a.event_title , a.event_description , a.event_image_id , a.event_start_date , a.event_end_date , a.min_discounted_price , a.max_discounted_price from view_event a
limit #{paging.limit} offset #{paging.offset}

select a.event_id , a.event_title , a.event_description , a.event_image_id , a.event_start_date , a.event_end_date , a.min_discounted_price , a.max_discounted_price from view_event a where a.event_id = #{id}
